title: UHY LLP Michigan Hosts Manufacturing Outlook 2016, Built to Compete
text:
UHY LLP's sixth annual Manufacturing Outlook will discuss important topics in the finance and manufacturing industries. Attendees will gain valuable insight on how to attract top talent , embrace risk and position their companies for a sustainable future.
Sterling Heights, MI (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
UHY LLP, the fifth largest accounting firm in Southeast Michigan, will host their sixth annual Manufacturing Outlook on Thursday, October 22 from 7:30AM—11:30AM at the Detroit Athletic Club. A panel of highly-qualified experts in the manufacturing and finance industries will discuss the importance of embracing risk for a sustainable future and how companies can position themselves to compete in today’s market. Topics include: sustainability through accountability within your organization and in family business, government legislation and an investor’s perspective on competitive manufacturing.
Featured presenters include keynote speaker Cynthia J. Pasky, founder, president and CEO of Strategic Staffing Solutions; Ann Wilson, senior vice president of Motor & Equipment Manufacturers Association; and David Sowerby of Loomis, Sayles & Co. Veronika Scott, founder and CEO of The Empowerment Plan, will also be there to talk about the locally-manufactured EMPWR coat and amazing accomplishments of this Detroit-based nonprofit organization dedicated to employing and serving the homeless community.
“Now is not the time to be complacent”, says Thomas V. Alongi, national manufacturing and global automotive practice partner. “In today’s competitive market, companies that are accountable and sustainable with specific, measurable goals will emerge as industry leaders.”
CPE credit will be offered. Shinola watch to be auctioned off to benefit The Empowerment Plan.
Advance registration for this complimentary event is required as seating is limited. Breakfast will be provided. Multiple registrations are welcome. To RSVP contact Jessica Dalessandro via email jdalessandro@uhy-us.com or phone 586 843 2507.
About UHY LLP
